item.title: Npc chat dosnt work!
item.dc:creator: @zero_fly zero fly
item.description:
@zero_fly wrote:

Frist i will like to thank you u helped me to make my npc tlak

if you gonna get em talk so they need to have Choose what they gonna say search after

/NPC Talking/

    case 920:
        sendFrame126(GetNpcName(NpcTalkTo), 4902);
        sendFrame126("Hey i welcome you to GodScape", 4903);
        sendFrame126("Every skill work! hope you enjoy!", 4904);
        sendFrame126("Magic fully work+teleport", 4905);
        sendFrame126("Server created by BlackShade.", 4906);
        sendFrame75(NpcTalkTo, 4901);
        sendFrame164(4900);
        NpcDialogueSend = true;
        break;

And then i did work
